page.title: 12Village Festival Weekend
page.content: June 22nd/23rd was Uffington village festival.Fun started with a Childrens' Treasure Hunt.A fete was held in the school field with a caravan rally next to it. The village was gay with bunt- ing and there were many games and side stalls. Vintage cars were on display and there was a chance to win a new Vauxhall Nova with the throw of 7 dice -no one was lucky! An evening Barn Dance and Barbecue was held in Genever's barn.A car-boot-sale on Sunday was in the field next to the church and a tug-of-war took place between The Parish Council, 2 Youth Club teams and the Village Hall Commi- ttee - the winners. The Church, beaut- ifully decorated throughout with masses of flowers, was full for the Sunday Service. The proceeds of Â£1500 was divided between the Church and the Village Hall.
